# flutter

Flutter SDK and Dart development

**Category:** Mobile Development

## Restrictive

Read-only operations safe for exploration and code review.

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `flutter --version` | Check Flutter version |
| `flutter doctor` | Check Flutter environment |
| `flutter doctor -v` | Verbose Flutter doctor |
| `flutter devices` | List connected devices |
| `flutter emulators` | List available emulators |
| `flutter config` | Show Flutter config |
| `flutter channel` | Show Flutter channel |
| `flutter --help` | Flutter help |
| `flutter pub deps` | Show dependencies |
| `flutter pub outdated` | List outdated packages |
| `flutter pub cache list` | List cached packages |
| `dart --version` | Check Dart version |
| `dart info` | Show Dart info |
| `dart pub deps` | Show Dart dependencies |
| `dart pub outdated` | List outdated packages |
| `dart --help` | Dart help |
| `dart analyze` | Analyze Dart code |
| `flutter analyze` | Analyze Flutter project |

## Standard

Day-to-day development commands. Includes all restrictive commands plus:

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `flutter run` | Run Flutter app |
| `flutter run --debug` | Run debug build |
| `flutter run --profile` | Run profile build |
| `flutter run --release` | Run release build |
| `flutter build` | Build Flutter app |
| `flutter build apk` | Build Android APK |
| `flutter build appbundle` | Build Android AAB |
| `flutter build ios` | Build iOS app |
| `flutter build ipa` | Build iOS IPA |
| `flutter build web` | Build web app |
| `flutter build macos` | Build macOS app |
| `flutter build windows` | Build Windows app |
| `flutter build linux` | Build Linux app |
| `flutter test` | Run Flutter tests |
| `flutter test --coverage` | Run tests with coverage |
| `flutter drive` | Run integration tests |
| `dart format` | Format Dart code |
| `flutter format` | Format Flutter code |
| `flutter pub get` | Get dependencies |
| `dart pub get` | Get Dart dependencies |
| `flutter gen-l10n` | Generate localizations |
| `flutter packages pub run build_runner build` | Run build_runner |
| `dart run` | Run Dart program |
| `dart compile` | Compile Dart code |
| `dart test` | Run Dart tests |
| `flutter emulators --launch` | Launch emulator |

## Permissive

Broader access for trusted projects. Includes all standard commands plus:

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `flutter pub upgrade` | Upgrade dependencies |
| `flutter pub add` | Add dependency |
| `flutter pub remove` | Remove dependency |
| `flutter pub cache clean` | Clean pub cache |
| `flutter pub cache repair` | Repair pub cache |
| `dart pub upgrade` | Upgrade Dart dependencies |
| `dart pub add` | Add Dart dependency |
| `dart pub remove` | Remove Dart dependency |
| `dart pub cache clean` | Clean Dart pub cache |
| `flutter clean` | Clean Flutter project |
| `flutter pub publish` | Publish Flutter package |
| `dart pub publish` | Publish Dart package |
| `flutter create` | Create new project |
| `flutter upgrade` | Upgrade Flutter SDK |
| `flutter downgrade` | Downgrade Flutter SDK |
| `flutter channel stable` | Switch to stable channel |
| `flutter channel beta` | Switch to beta channel |
| `flutter channel master` | Switch to master channel |
| `flutter precache` | Precache Flutter artifacts |
| `flutter config --enable-web` | Enable web support |
| `flutter config --enable-macos-desktop` | Enable macOS support |
| `flutter config --enable-windows-desktop` | Enable Windows support |
| `flutter config --enable-linux-desktop` | Enable Linux support |
